title: Url Shortener
description: Convert long URLs into short ones

content.inputUrl: Input the url you want to shorten
content.customCodeLimit: Only English letters, numbers, and -, at least 3 characters

error.lengthTooShort: This url is already short enough...
error.urlTooLong: This url is too long... must be shortened!
error.customCodeExists: This short code is already used
